code: import axios from"axios";import{LOGIN,LOGOUT,SIGNUP,USERINFO}from"../../api";const baseURL=process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL;export function setHeadersToken(token){axios.defaults.headers.common.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}export function unSetHeadersToken(){axios.defaults.headers.common.Authorization="";}export const signUpApi=async userData=>{const{data}=await axios.post("".concat(baseURL," ").concat(SIGNUP),userData);setHeadersToken(data.token);return data;};export const signInApi=async userData=>{const{data}=await axios.post("".concat(baseURL).concat(LOGIN),userData);setHeadersToken(data.token);return data;};export async function getUserInfoApi(){const{data}=await axios(USERINFO);return data;}export const logoutApi=async()=>{const{data}=await axios.post("".concat(baseURL," ").concat(LOGOUT));unSetHeadersToken();return data;};
